resources.string:
NDKmol - Molecular Viewer for Android
 Please visit http://webglmol.sfjp.jp/ for the details and source codes. You can also get WebGL version there.
 
 
 
 *** LICENSE NOTICE *** 
 NDKmol itself is licensed under GNU Lesser General Public License as follows.
 
 However, PDB files included as examples are under DIFFERENT conditions.
 Please consult http://www.rcsb.org/pdb/static.do?p=general_information/about_pdb/pdb_advisory.html
 
 -------------
 
 The structure used as an example is adapted from PDB, ID 2POR:
 "Structure of porin refined at 1.8 A resolution"
 Weiss, M.S., Schulz, G.E., J.Mol.Biol. 227: 493-509 (1992) 
 -------------
 
 NDKmol - Molecular Viewer for Android

 You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/
This file is too big. Please consider using NDKmol which is available at Android Market or my project website.
This file is too big to open.
Unknown file type. Only .pdb / .sdf / .mol files are supported.
Found too many entries. Displaying only part of them.
Error occurred while downloading the structure.
PubChem does not provide a three dimensional structure of this compound(Only two dimensional structure is available). Download was canceled.
On some devices, this causes a coloring problem. If molecule turns gray, please uncheck this.
You can search 3D structure using NCI/CADD CACTUS chemical identifer resolver.\nFor example, try searching \'xenon hexafluoride\'.
